text: Anachis valledori is a species of sea snail in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== The shell grows to a length of 8.3 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off the Cape Verdes. ==References== * Rolán E., 2005. Malacological Fauna From The Cape Verde Archipelago. Part 1, Polyplacophora and Gastropoda. ==External links== * valledori Category:Gastropods described in 2002 Category:Gastropods of Cape Verde
title: Anachis valledori
